misc: Has a habit of getting lost on golf course grounds
Does not spit in the glass
biography: Janne, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is set to make his eighth appearance at the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. Representing Revontuli Golf, Janne is known for his generous spirit and unwavering commitment to fair play. Janne is also known to be a true gentleman, never spitting in the glass.

Despite his years of experience at the Hector Trophée, victory has eluded Janne thus far, both in the pair and individual competitions. However, Janne's enthusiasm remains undeterred, and he approaches each tournament with renewed vigor. Teammates appreciate Janne's positive attitude, which helps everyone to keep their chin up even when the going gets tough.

Off the course, Janne is known for his... unique sense of direction. Stories abound of Janne getting lost on the grounds, sometimes even during play. Despite these occasional navigational challenges, Janne remains a beloved figure among fellow competitors and fans alike.
